name: Scallops With Leeks, Mushrooms And Potatoes
keywords: chardonnay, italian parsley, leek, lemon, new red potato, sea scallop, shiitake, spices, low calorie, low cholesterol, main course
recipeIngredient: Chardonnay, lemon and herb steaming liquid (see recipe)
3 medium leeks, white and light green parts only, halved lengthwise and cut across into thin slices
2 cups shiitake mushrooms, stemmed and thinly sliced
1 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the potatoes in a steamer, cover and steam over the liquid for 5 minutes. Add the leeks, mushrooms and scallops and sprinkle with parsley. Steam until the scallops are just cooked through, about 12 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Divide among 4 plates and serve immediately.
